Game.Name: 2 Games in 1 - SpongeBob SquarePants - Battle for Bikini Bottom + Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius (Europe) (En,Fr,De+En,Fr,De,Es)
Game.plot: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom / Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Various and published by THQ,which was released in Europe in 2005.Cheat: These codes will let you access any of Jimmy or Goddard's Levels in easy mode. To enter these codes choose the ''Enter Code'' at the Main Menu. Asteroid Field: WM5DR5H3MCLB Yokian Moon: KVZQG3Q50LZG Yolkus: 51867F7MJ5YP Yokian Palace: MMS-KXBVC4FS Dungeon: N?+94T1?DJXW Boss 1 Poutra: 939BSYT41N0Z Boss 2 King Goobot: BD5VVRDF3GXV Ending Scene: 3L!VPH26V7$8 Cheat: These codes will let you access any of Jimmy or Goddard's Levels in hard mode. To enter these codes choose the ''Enter Code'' at the Main Menu. Asteroid Belt: 2040YL61TT0T Yokian Moon: GGP6WCC273-3 Yolkus: 2H?-!L81TT0K Yokian Palace: +R6H!L91TT0F Dungeon: 456N$DWBWM?F Boss 1 Poutra: XZ16F2F8NS$! Boss 2 King Goobot: GRZB87HNYFR2 Ending Scene: +CLT3LD1TTSF
